page.title: 18WILDLIFE IN GOLLANFIELD
page.content: {Foxes} around our area are killing many birds.There have been three cormorants killed by foxes;they also give trouble to the {farmers}by killing their sheep and lambs. {Frogs There's a well beside the {loch}in which the frogs live.Sometimes they get eaten by the {heron}.First the heron stays very still until a frog comes along then the {heron }jumps on him and the frog is killed.When spring comes the frogs lay their eggs. {Panther} There is a panther going around with its baby.The panther has killed 18 lambs from a farm.It has been roaming around for about a year and a half.
